PYROGRAM_SESSION.description: The session string generated by login.py

PYROGRAM_CONFIG.description: The config string generated by login.py

LOGS_CHAT.description: The Telegram chat id of the logs chat (can be a user, channel, group...)

BOT_TOKEN.description: The Telegram token of the assistant bot

SUDOERS_LIST.description: A space-delimited list of the sudoers ids or usernames

LANGUAGE.description: The default language for UserLixo strings
